https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/aVScoHne8vF5zNQa23oDK9waeUT.jpg Six unused scenes from Where Does Your Hidden Smile Lie? One of the more priceless of the “bagatelles” in this collection features a lounging Jean-Marie Straub who gives a non-stop disquisition on liberty and filmmaking while Danièle Huillet busies herself with laundry, and their dog Melchior frisks in and out of frame. —Cinematheque Ontario 6 Bagatelas
